function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty of the population size of the study","Impact":"Inaccurate sample size estimation can lead to biased results and unreliable conclusions.","Mitigation":"Use advanced statistical techniques for sample size determination and consider consulting with a statistician.","Technologies":"Statistical software for sample size calculation, consultation with statistical experts.","People":"Research team, statisticians, data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, statistical department."},{"Description":"Random sampling selection","Impact":"Risk of non-representative sample, leading to biased results and limited generalizability.","Mitigation":"Consider using stratified or cluster sampling methods to improve representativeness.","Technologies":"Stratified or cluster sampling techniques, survey software for randomization.","People":"Research team, statisticians, sampling experts.","Owner":"Research team, statistical department."},{"Description":"Difficulty of collecting information","Impact":"Incomplete or biased data collection, leading to inaccurate analysis and conclusions.","Mitigation":"Implement strong data collection protocols, use multiple data collection methods, and provide incentives for participation.","Technologies":"Data collection software, survey tools, incentives management systems.","People":"Research team, data collectors, respondents.","Owner":"Research team, data collection department."}]}
